name: Chroma Club - 3D Role Play Simulator
description:
HERE IS WHY YOU SHOULD JOIN CHROMA CLUB...

* BUILD AND PLAY AWESOME APPS -- have fun making mini-games like hidden objects, jigsaw puzzles, role-play games, car games, and racing games

* CHAT AND PARTY WITH FRIENDS -- chat, party, draw doodles, play games, write stories, create jobs, and build apps with friends

* JOIN THE COMMUNITY -- work with other Chroma Club members to create stories, design new apps, and draw your wildest dreams

* START A CLUB -- start a club based on your interests, hold meetings, and pursue new ideas

* PLAY GAMES AND EARN COINS -- Play fun mini-games and earn coins :)

STILL NOT CONVINCED...HERE'S ANOTHER PERSPECTIVE ;)

Chroma Club is a 3d game that will rock your world.

Create games, draw doodles, do projects, and make music with friends! Join adventures with other members of Chroma Club and express yourself through drawings, music, and games!

Expand your horizon and feel free to create and have tons of fun in this unique space and club. Join your friends and express yourself!
